title: How to Save PS1 Games on PS3

steps.headline: Go to the game tab of the menu.
Go in and select create new memory card.
Hover over your new memory card, press the triangle and put it in slot 1.
Start your game and save it to the memory card!

text: Go to the game tab of the menu.  Go to "memory cards."  Go in and select create new memory card.  Choose ps1 or ps2.  Hover over your new memory card, press the triangle and put it in slot 1.  Start your game and save it to the memory card!
